## Pre-Review Verification

All items must be checked before requesting review:

- [ ] `npm run typecheck` passes
- [ ] `npm test` passes (100% coverage maintained)
- [ ] **code-simplifier agent review completed**
- [ ] TDD was followed (tests written before implementation)
- [ ] Manual testing completed (if applicable)

## Quality Checklist

- [ ] No new dependencies added (or explicitly approved)
- [ ] Follows existing code patterns
- [ ] Tests cover new functionality (not just coverage)
- [ ] Documentation updated if needed
- [ ] No scope creep (only changes needed for the task)

## Principal Review (REQUIRED)

**This PR requires approval from a principal-cpp-architect agent.**

Principal will verify:
1. Changes are necessary
2. Implementation quality is high
3. Protocols were followed (TDD, code-simplifier)
4. No regressions or scope creep

- [ ] **Principal review requested**
- [ ] **All [AI-PRINCIPAL] comments addressed**
- [ ] **Principal approval received**
